leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-单细胞与空间组学生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→整合→聚类/轨迹→注释→可视化→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: R/Python生态 + 交互可视化 + pipelines

unit.unit_name: 细胞类型注释/参考映射/marker

queries: [WEB] scRNA-seq automated cell type annotation github
[WEB] marker gene discovery tools scRNA-seq github
[WEB] spatial transcriptomics cell type mapping github

tools.name: Azimuth (CRISPR)
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning model for predicting CRISPR/Cas9 guide efficiency
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning-based predictive modeling tool developed by Microsoft Research to estimate the efficiency of CRISPR/Cas9 guide RNAs. It aids in the design of gene editing experiments by ranking potential guide sequences.

tools.name: QGIS Earth Sun Moon Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: QGIS plugin for calculating celestial body positions
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the QGIS platform that calculates and visualizes the zenith locations of the sun, moon, and planets for specific dates and times, aiding in geospatial and astronomical analysis.

tools.name: QGIS Shape Tools Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Geodesic shape creation and measurement tools for QGIS
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive QGIS plugin providing tools for creating geodesic shapes, measuring geodesic distances, and performing advanced geospatial operations like densification and rotation.

tools.name: sun-angle
tools.one_line_profile: Solar azimuth and elevation calculator
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating the sun's position (azimuth and elevation) based on geographic coordinates and time, useful for solar energy research and astronomical modeling.

tools.name: RayTomo
tools.one_line_profile: Seismic surface wave tomography tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for 2-D tomography of seismic surface wave isotropic and azimuthally anisotropic group/phase speeds, used in geophysics for subsurface imaging.

tools.name: CyteType
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-driven cell type annotation for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool leveraging multi-agent Large Language Models (LLMs) to automate cell type annotation in single-cell RNA sequencing data, aiming to improve annotation accuracy and efficiency.

tools.name: CyteTypeR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for CyteType LLM annotation
tools.detailed_description: The R implementation of the CyteType tool, enabling R users to utilize multi-agent LLMs for automated cell type annotation in single-cell RNA-seq workflows.

tools.name: CIARA
tools.one_line_profile: Rare cell type marker identification tool
tools.detailed_description: An R package developed by Scialdone Lab for identifying potential markers of rare cell types in single-cell RNA-seq data by detecting genes with expression confined to small regions of the expression space.

tools.name: SunKit
tools.one_line_profile: Swift library for solar mathematics
tools.detailed_description: A Swift library that provides mathematical and trigonometric functions to compute various solar parameters and information, suitable for astronomical applications on Apple platforms.

tools.name: CellTypist
tools.one_line_profile: Automated cell type annotation tool for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for semi-automatic cell type classification in single-cell RNA sequencing data, utilizing a comprehensive database of pre-trained models to annotate cells across various tissues and immune states.

tools.name: scCATCH
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic cluster-based cell type annotation
tools.detailed_description: An R package for automatic annotation of cell types in single-cell RNA-seq data clusters. It utilizes tissue-specific cell taxonomy reference databases to identify marker genes and assign cell types.

tools.name: scDeepSort
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based cell-type annotation
tools.detailed_description: A single-cell cell-type annotation tool that uses a weighted Graph Neural Network (GNN) and deep learning to project cells into a pre-trained reference space for accurate classification.

tools.name: stereoscope
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial mapping of cell types by integrating scRNA-seq and spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: A probabilistic method for spatial mapping of cell types by integrating single-cell RNA-seq and spatial transcriptomics data, enabling the deconvolution of spatial spots.

tools.name: Symphony (Molecule Generation)
tools.one_line_profile: Symmetry-Equivariant Point-Centered Spherical Harmonics for Molecule Generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for 3D molecule generation that utilizes symmetry-equivariant point-centered spherical harmonics to capture molecular geometry.

tools.name: PHASIS
tools.one_line_profile: Suite for phased small RNA cluster discovery and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite for the discovery, comparison, and annotation of phased siRNA clusters (PHAS) and identification of miRNA triggers in plant genomes.

tools.name: decontam
tools.one_line_profile: Contaminant identification and removal in marker-gene and metagenomics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for identifying and removing contaminants in marker-gene and metagenomics sequencing data based on DNA concentration or prevalence profiles.

tools.name: SCSA
tools.one_line_profile: Cell type annotation for single-cell RNA-seq data using marker genes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic cell type annotation of single-cell RNA-seq data based on known marker genes from databases like CellMarker and CancerSEA.

tools.name: s2-angs
tools.one_line_profile: Calculation of Sentinel-2 viewing and sun angles
tools.detailed_description: A Python script to calculate view zenith, view azimuth, sun zenith, and sun azimuth angles for Sentinel-2 satellite imagery.

tools.name: Tangram
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial alignment of single cell transcriptomic data to spatial data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for mapping single-cell gene expression data onto spatial transcriptomics data, enabling the reconstruction of spatial gene expression patterns.

tools.name: spSeudoMap
tools.one_line_profile: Cell type mapping of spatial transcriptomics using unmatched scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for mapping cell types in spatial transcriptomics data by leveraging unmatched single-cell RNA-seq references.

tools.name: scDiagnostics
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostics for assessing cell type annotation quality in scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A set of diagnostic functions to evaluate and assess the quality and reliability of cell type annotations in single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: SYMPHONY (Solver)
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for mixed-integer linear programs (MILPs)
tools.detailed_description: An open-source solver, callable library, and framework for solving mixed-integer linear programs (MILPs), widely used in operations research and scientific optimization.

tools.name: garnett
tools.one_line_profile: Automated cell type classification for single-cell expression data
tools.detailed_description: A software package that facilitates automated cell type classification from single-cell expression data using a marker file and a hierarchical classification algorithm.

tools.name: HiCAT
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical cell-type annotation tool for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A high-precision, marker-based, hierarchical cell-type annotation tool designed for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis.

tools.name: pysattracker
tools.one_line_profile: Satellite tracking and orbital calculation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating azimuth, elevation, doppler shift, and other parameters for satellite overflights.

tools.name: CytoSPACE
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal mapping of scRNA-seq data to spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the optimal mapping of single-cell RNA-seq data to spatial transcriptomics data, aiming to reconstruct single-cell resolution spatial maps.

tools.name: XGBoost
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable and distributed gradient boosting library
tools.detailed_description: An optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed to be highly efficient, flexible and portable, widely used for scientific data analysis and machine learning tasks.

tools.name: MMoCHi
tools.one_line_profile: MultiModal Classifier Hierarchy for cell classification
tools.detailed_description: A tool for multimodal classification of cell types, leveraging hierarchical structures to improve annotation accuracy.

tools.name: d2geo
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for computing seismic attributes
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for computing seismic attributes, facilitating geophysical data analysis and interpretation.

tools.name: Symphony MT
tools.one_line_profile: Machine translation framework
tools.detailed_description: A machine translation framework designed for research and production, supporting various translation models and tasks.

tools.name: Northstar
tools.one_line_profile: Atlas-guided single-cell type annotation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for single-cell type annotation that uses cell atlases as a reference while allowing for the discovery of novel cell types ('freedom to be queer').

tools.name: VarGenius
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for genomic variants discovery and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A software pipeline for variants discovery and annotation that manages data and job submission on PBS clusters, integrating tools like Picard, Samtools, BWA, GATK, and Annovar, with results stored in PostgreSQL.

tools.name: DeepCAN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning system for automated cell counting and viability analysis
tools.detailed_description: A modular deep learning system for automated image cytometry that performs cell segmentation, cluster separation, and viability classification using CNN architectures (U-Net, LeNet-5 variants).

tools.name: prettyClusters
tools.one_line_profile: R package for annotation and illustration of gene clusters
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the annotation, analysis, and visualization of gene clusters, facilitating genomic data interpretation.

tools.name: COSG
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate and fast cell marker gene identification method
tools.detailed_description: A method for identifying marker genes in single-cell RNA sequencing data, prioritizing accuracy and speed.

tools.name: COSGR
tools.one_line_profile: R implementation of the COSG marker gene identification method
tools.detailed_description: The R package implementation of COSG for fast and accurate cell marker gene identification in single-cell data.

tools.name: GeneSCF
tools.one_line_profile: Command line tool for gene set clustering based on functional annotation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for clustering gene sets using functional annotations, aiding in functional enrichment analysis.

tools.name: garnett
tools.one_line_profile: File parsers and writers for particle trajectory formats
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing parsers and writers for various particle trajectory file formats, developed and used by the Glotzer Group for soft matter physics simulations.

tools.name: scClassifR
tools.one_line_profile: Automated cell type classification for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package to automatically classify cell types in single-cell RNA-seq datasets, supporting Seurat and SingleCellExperiment objects.

tools.name: geocalc
tools.one_line_profile: Library for calculating Earth distances and bearings
tools.detailed_description: A Java library providing helper classes for geodesic calculations such as distances and bearings on the Earth's surface.

tools.name: CytoTRACE
tools.one_line_profile: Predicts differentiation state from scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A computational method that predicts the differentiation state (developmental potential) of cells from single-cell RNA-sequencing data based on gene counts.

tools.name: Symphony
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient single-cell reference atlas mapping
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for efficient and precise mapping of single-cell query datasets onto reference atlases, facilitating data integration and annotation transfer.

tools.name: ASWMS-Q
tools.one_line_profile: Seismological data functional method with anisotropy and attenuation
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab implementation of the Generalized Seismological Data Functionals (GSDF) method, extended to include azimuthal anisotropy and attenuation for geophysics research.

tools.name: YOLO-SCSA
tools.one_line_profile: Attention-enhanced YOLO model for skin lesion detection
tools.detailed_description: An integration of the SCSA attention module into the YOLOv8 architecture specifically optimized for the detection of skin lesions in medical images.

tools.name: PyHRTFSweeper
tools.one_line_profile: HRTF audio sweeper implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based implementation for Head-Related Transfer Function (HRTF) processing that sweeps an audio file around the azimuth, used in acoustics and psychoacoustics research.

tools.name: PyMeso
tools.one_line_profile: Azimuthal shear calculation and vortex wind field creation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calculating azimuthal shear using the linear least squares derivative method and creating ideal vortex wind fields, used in meteorology for mesocyclone detection.

tools.name: gnssSNR
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extracting SNR, azimuth, and elevation data from GNSS RINEX files
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool designed to strip Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) data along with satellite azimuth and elevation angles from RINEX files, primarily used in geodetic and reflectometry research.

tools.name: aidata
tools.one_line_profile: Image and annotation data pipeline for marine biology workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility from MBARI for extracting, transforming, loading, and augmenting images and annotations, designed to support detection, clustering, and classification workflows in marine research.

tools.name: CRISP
tools.one_line_profile: Drug response prediction using transfer learning with foundation models
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for predicting drug responses in unseen cell types by leveraging transfer learning and foundation models, published in Nature Computational Science.

tools.name: EnformerCelltyping
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting histone marks across cell types using DNA interactions
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based model utilizing multi-headed attention to incorporate distal DNA interaction effects for predicting histone marks across diverse cell types.

tools.name: SCANVIS
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for scoring, annotating, and visualizing splice junctions
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by NYGenome for the analysis of splice junctions in RNA-seq data, providing functionality for scoring, annotation, and visualization.

tools.name: task_perturbation_prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for predicting small molecule perturbation effects on gene expression
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite from the OpenProblems project for evaluating methods that predict how small molecules change gene expression across different cell types.

tools.name: retreat
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time Tremor Analysis Tool for seismic array data
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for performing f-k analysis on real-time or archived seismic array data to calculate back azimuth and slowness, aiding in the location of volcanic tremor signals.

tools.name: ccAF
tools.one_line_profile: Cell cycle classifier for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A classifier designed to assign cell cycle phases to single-cell RNA-seq data, developed by the Plaisier Lab.

tools.name: symphonypy
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Symphony single-cell reference mapping algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python port of the Symphony algorithm, enabling efficient mapping of query single-cell datasets onto reference atlases for label transfer and annotation.

tools.name: ELeFHAnt
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble Learning for Harmonization and Annotation of Single Cells
tools.detailed_description: An R package that uses an ensemble of machine learning classifiers (RF, SVM, LR) to annotate single-cell clusters, harmonize labels across datasets, and infer cell type relationships.

tools.name: scRNA_cell_deconv_benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark of cell type annotation R packages for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive evaluation and benchmarking of various R packages designed for cell type annotation in single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: cell-annotator
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for consistent automatic cell type annotation across samples
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool developed by QuadBio to automatically annotate cell types in single-cell data, ensuring consistency across different samples.

tools.name: cellmapper
tools.one_line_profile: k-NN-based mapping for label and embedding transfer in single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for mapping cells across representations using k-Nearest Neighbors to transfer labels, embeddings, and expression values, facilitating data integration and annotation.

tools.name: OrbWeaver
tools.one_line_profile: CNN for predicting chromatin accessibility from DNA sequence
tools.detailed_description: A convolutional neural network model designed to predict chromatin accessibility across multiple cell types directly from DNA sequences, aiding in the understanding of gene regulation.

tools.name: fisheye
tools.one_line_profile: R package for log-azimuthal map projections
tools.detailed_description: A tool to transform base maps using log-azimuthal projection, useful for specific cartographic visualizations and geospatial analysis.

tools.name: SolarNOAA
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solar position and time calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Swift implementation of NOAA's procedure to calculate local times of sunrise, sunset, solar noon, azimuth, and elevation.

tools.name: active_gp_hyperlearning
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning of Gaussian Process hyperparameters
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB implementation for active learning of linear embeddings for Gaussian Processes, facilitating efficient model selection and hyperparameter tuning in scientific modeling.

tools.name: mgp
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Marginal Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library implementing the Marginal Gaussian Process (MGP) model, useful for regression and active learning tasks in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: spatial_LDA
tools.one_line_profile: Image-based Latent Dirichlet Allocation for spatial analysis
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of an image-based LDA model using CNN features to group unlabeled images into topics, aiding in the semi-automation of image annotation and curation.

tools.name: NetTIME
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting cell type-specific TF binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A multitask learning framework designed to predict transcription factor binding sites with base-pair resolution in a cell type-specific manner.

tools.name: Azimuth
tools.one_line_profile: Web app and reference mapping tool for single-cell datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool (available as a Shiny app and R package) for mapping single-cell query datasets to reference atlases, enabling automated cell type annotation and data integration.

tools.name: Seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for single-cell genomics
tools.detailed_description: A leading R toolkit for single-cell genomics, providing methods for quality control, analysis, and exploration of scRNA-seq data, including clustering, integration, and visualization.

tools.name: fheatmap
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality heatmap generation in R
tools.detailed_description: An R function wrapper around ggplot2 to create elegant, high-quality heatmaps with advanced annotation capabilities for rows and columns.

tools.name: CelestialUtil
tools.one_line_profile: Library for celestial body position calculations
tools.detailed_description: An Objective-C library to calculate declination, azimuth, altitude, and geocentric distance of the Sun and Moon based on location and time.

tools.name: pyFAI
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Azimuthal Integration for X-ray scattering
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for fast azimuthal integration of 2D X-ray scattering data, converting diffraction images into 1D powder diffraction patterns.

tools.name: Census
tools.one_line_profile: Automated scRNA-seq cell-type annotation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurate, deep, fast, and fully-automated cell-type annotation of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: VoPo
tools.one_line_profile: Automated cell-population discovery for mass cytometry
tools.detailed_description: A scalable, downsampling-free tool for automated cell-population discovery, feature engineering, classification, and visualization, primarily for mass cytometry data.

tools.name: ScInfeR
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based cell type annotation toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A graph-based toolkit for cell type annotation applicable to single-cell RNA-seq, ATAC-seq, and spatial omics data.

tools.name: earth-ae
tools.one_line_profile: Earth wind visualization with Azimuthal Equidistant view
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool based on earth.nullschool.net, modified to provide an Azimuthal Equidistant view for global wind and weather data.

tools.name: Vincenty-Excel
tools.one_line_profile: Vincenty's geodesic formulae for Excel
tools.detailed_description: VBA implementation of Thaddeus Vincenty's Direct and Inverse formulae for accurate geodesic calculations (distance, azimuth, coordinates) within Excel.

tools.name: MapQC
tools.one_line_profile: Metric for evaluating single-cell query-to-reference mappings
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing metrics to evaluate the quality of single-cell query-to-reference mappings, helping to assess the reliability of transferred annotations.

tools.name: scArches
tools.one_line_profile: Reference mapping and integration for single-cell genomics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for mapping query datasets to reference atlases in single-cell genomics, enabling efficient data integration and annotation transfer.

tools.name: Human Endometrial Cell Atlas (HECA)
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated single-cell reference atlas of the human endometrium
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive single-cell reference atlas for the human endometrium, integrating transcriptomic data to characterize cell types and states. It serves as a reference dataset for cell type annotation and mapping in reproductive biology research.

tools.name: Opfi
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for discovery and annotation of gene clusters in genomics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the discovery, annotation, and analysis of gene clusters (operons) in genomics or metagenomics datasets. It facilitates the identification of functionally related gene groups.

tools.name: Melon
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic long-read taxonomic identification using marker genes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for taxonomic identification and quantification in metagenomic long-read data. It utilizes marker genes to provide accurate classification of microbial communities from sequencing data.
